member.name: T:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.EnvironmentConfigBuilder
member.summary: A ConfigurationProvider that retrieves values from environment variables.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.EnvironmentConfigBuilder.LazyInitialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.param: The friendly name of the provider.
A collection of the name/value pairs representing builder-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.EnvironmentConfigBuilder.GetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Looks up a single 'value' for the given 'key.'
member.param: The 'key' to look up in the environment. (Prefix handling is not needed here.)
member.returns: The value corresponding to the given 'key' or null if no value is found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.EnvironmentConfigBuilder.GetAllValues(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all known key/value pairs from the environment where the key begins with with .
member.param: A prefix string to filter the list of potential keys retrieved from the source.
